title: ResourceOverride holds configuration to customize resource diffing and health assessment

actions.description: Actions defines the set of actions that can be performed on the resource, as a Lua script.

healthLua.description: HealthLua contains a Lua script that defines custom health checks for the resource.

ignoreDifferences.title:
OverrideIgnoreDiff contains configurations about how fields should be ignored during diffs between
the desired state and live state

jSONPointers.title: JSONPointers is a JSON path list following the format defined in RFC4627 (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6902#section-3)

jqPathExpressions.title: JQPathExpressions is a JQ path list that will be evaludated during the diff process

managedFieldsManagers.title:
ManagedFieldsManagers is a list of trusted managers. Fields mutated by those managers will take precedence over the
desired state defined in the SCM and won't be displayed in diffs

knownTypeFields.description: KnownTypeFields lists fields for which unit conversions should be applied.

items.description:
KnownTypeField contains a mapping between a Custom Resource Definition (CRD) field
and a well-known Kubernetes type. This mapping is primarily used for unit conversions
in resources where the type is not explicitly defined (e.g., converting "0.1" to "100m" for CPU requests).

field.title:
Field represents the JSON path to the specific field in the CRD that requires type conversion.
Example: "spec.resources.requests.cpu"

type.description:
Type specifies the expected Kubernetes type for the field, such as "cpu" or "memory".
This helps in converting values between different formats (e.g., "0.1" to "100m" for CPU).

useOpenLibs.description: UseOpenLibs indicates whether to use open-source libraries for the resource.
